summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UI/UX fixes - blog page scroll to top, newsletter section text updates, and step badge narrative flow implementation
passed_tests: Blog page (/blog) successfully scrolls to top on page load (scroll position: 0)
Newsletter section title changed to 'Explore More Pain Science' (old title removed)
Newsletter button text updated to 'Visit Our Newsletter' with external link icon
Newsletter button correctly links to https://recalibrate.beehiiv.com with proper security attributes
Hero section displays 'Step 1 · First Look' badge above phone mockup
How It Works section displays 'Step 2 · Your Journey' badge
Features section displays 'Step 3 · Deep Dive' badge with 'What's Inside' title
All three step badges create cohesive narrative flow between sections
External newsletter link opens in new tab with proper noopener noreferrer attributes
